feed.title: Google Cloud: Memorystore for Redis Cluster
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Memorystore for Redis Cluster

entry.content: The customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) feature for Memorystore for Redis Cluster is now Generally Available.
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that Customer-Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK) for Memorystore for Redis Cluster is now Generally Available. This feature allows you to manage your own encryption keys for enhanced security.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Redis Cluster Now Supports CMEK
